mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.app_type, a.app_type_name, a.rule AS "rule", a.incre_num, a.level_index, a.create_date, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag, ay.is_deploy AS isPublish, b.id as "detailId", b.rule_type as "ruleType", b.text as "text", b.type_value as "typeValue", b.num_length as "numLength", b.pro_number_rule_id as "proNumberRuleId", b.sort as "sort"
LEFT JOIN sys_number_rule_detail b ON a.id = b.pro_number_rule_id LEFT JOIN act_yw ay ON ay.id = a.app_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_number_rule( id, name, app_type, app_type_name, rule, incre_num, level_index, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{appType}, #{appTypeName}, #{rule}, #{increNum}, #{levelIndex}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_number_rule SET name = #{name}, app_type = #{appType}, app_type_name = #{appTypeName}, rule = #{rule}, incre_num = #{increNum}, level_index = #{levelIndex}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
